videos.headline: Jones' returns opening kickoff for Troy TD
videos.description: Marcus Jones' shows off his speed on a 91-yard kickoff return for a touchdown.

videos.headline: Troy's Jones gets another punt return for TD
videos.description: Marcus Jones' 87-yard punt return for a touchdown increases Troy's lead 14-3.

videos.headline: Anderson finds open Williams for Coastal Carolina TD
videos.description: Kilton Anderson connects with Malcolm Williams in the end zone for Coastal Carolina's first touchdown of the game.

videos.headline: Silvers keeps the football for Troy TD
videos.description: Troy's QB Brandon Silvers fakes a handoff and rushes 10 yards to the end zone for a touchdown.

videos.headline: Chunn rushes for another Troy TD
videos.description: Jordan Chunn's 8 yard touchdown run keeps Troy ahead 28-10.

videos.headline: Coastal Carolina's Anderson throws nice TD pass to Jones
videos.description: Kilton Anderson delivers a 44-yard touchdown pass to Chris Jones early in the second half.
